name: Yoko (V1.0)
description:
Yoko: The Visual Novel Follow the origin story of Yoko and her friends.

10 episodes filled with narrative,  scenic pictures, visual and sound effects to enhance your immersion.

Four different endings based on your decisions.

Unlock over 20 character profiles and scenes.

Please let me know if you find any bugs I will try to fix them ASAP :)

PS: I'm aware there are some bugs with some sfx being too low and a certain ending unlockable not unlocking. I will be working on it!
